Another history-oriented film you might enjoy is "Kundun," which provides an insightful look into the life of Tibet's 14th Dalai Lama and the cultural clash with Chinese oppression. Enjoy your historical movie adventure!

In this heartwarming film, a son and his father, who never truly understood each other in life, find connection as the son helps the ghostly father cross over. It's a thought-provoking exploration of family relationships with some emotional depth.

If you're interested in exploring more works by Audrey Wells, 'Great Expectations' (1860) is another captivating film that updates Charles Dickens' classic tale for modern audiences. This version stars Finn as a painter pursuing an unrequited love in New York City.
